definitions.definition: Silly , especially at an inappropriate time or in an inappropriate manner; lacking a good reason for being, or for doing what one does; due to or moved by a whim or caprice .
Of little weight or importance ; not worth notice ; slight ; trivial .
Having no reasonable prospect of success because its claim is without merit , lacking a supporting legal or factual basis, while the filing party is, or should be, aware of this.

main_definition: Silly , especially at an inappropriate time or in an inappropriate manner; lacking a good reason for being, or for doing what one does; due to or moved by a whim or caprice .
secondary_definitions: Of little weight or importance ; not worth notice ; slight ; trivial .

( law , said of a lawsuit ) Having no reasonable prospect of success because its claim is without merit , lacking a supporting legal or factual basis, while the filing party is, or should be, aware of this.
